elements.text:
line(x0, y0, x1, y1, [col]) draws a colored line from
one point to another.

This draws a line from the position (0, 0) to
the position (20, 10). The line is colored red.

x0
  x position of point one.
0
  y position of point one.
x1
  x position of point two.
y1
  y poisition of point two.
[col]
  Colour of the line. If omitted, uses the
  last color something was drawn in.
